review: It's been fine when it stays connected.  I have to unplug the power and also from the hdmi almost everytime I want to use it.  It drops connection often, but every once in a while it holds the connection the whole time I'm using it.  Kinda disappointed.  I have 30mb down and 7 up so I know it isn't the connection.  I do use an apple airport extreme so maybe that has something to do with it.  It shouldn't be that much work though. (also to note I purchased this at Best Buy and not Amazon.
